name: C.Rogue
description:
C.Rogue is a RogueLite FPS made for the My Little Roguelike #1 game jam. Your goal is to survive as long as possible and unlock all of the zones and enemies. 

Break any vases you see and use those upgrades to your advantage. This game gets hard quick and you'll need to learn quick to survive the stronger enemies. Don't forget to read the logs, some might give you some useful information. 

This was my first game jam so let me know what you think!
